protocol_name: Immunofluorescence staining protocol for co-staining of fetuin-A and CD68 in older human autopsy tissue
protocol_name_html: Immunofluorescence staining protocol for co-staining of fetuin-A and CD68 in older human autopsy tissue
description: This staining was performed to detect fetuin-A in activated microglia. CD68 is a marker, that stains activated microglia, macrophages and monocytes. Fetuin-A and microglia were detected in paraffin sections (1 μm thickness) of formalin-fixed human brain tissue. CD68 was stained using a monoclonal mouse-anti-human antibody (Dako Cat# M0814, RRID:AB_2314148, clone KP1, dilution 1:50) and a polyclonal goat-anti-mouse Alexa Fluor® 488 conjugated secondary antibody (Thermo Fisher Scientific Cat# A-11029, RRID:AB_2534088, dilution 1:300). Fetuin-A was detected by using a monoclonal IgG2a mouse-anti-human antibody (clone MAHS-1, dilution 1.0 µg/mL), raised against purified human fetuin-A in our laboratories. Antibody binding was detected by tyramide signal amplification using a secondary biotinylated polyclonal goat-anti-mouse antibody (Dako Cat# E0433, RRID:AB_2687905, dilution 1:300) and a Tyramide Signal Amplification Kit (Life Technologies, Carlsbad, USA, T-20933). To minimize lipofuscin autofluorescence, sections were counterstained with Sudan Black (Sigma-Aldrich, Munich, Germany, 199664, dilution 0.3% in 70% ethanol, 5 minutes). Nuclei were stained with DAPI (Sigma-Aldrich, Munich, Germany D9542, dilution 0.25 µg/ml, 5 minutes). Sections were mounted with Immumount (Thermo Scientific, Waltham, USA, 9990402) and stored at 8°C in the dark.
before_start:
Prepare the following components of the Tyramide Signal Amplification Kit according to the manufacturers protocol:

  1. Prepare tyramide stock solution by dissolving Component A in 150 μL of Component B (DMSO). (Store unused portions of this stock solution in small aliquots at ≤–20°C, protected from light).
  2. Prepare a 1% (10 mg/mL) solution of Component D (BSA) in phosphate-buffered saline (PBS).
  3. Prepare the horse radish peroxidase (HRP) conjugate stock solution by reconstituting Component C in 200 µl PBS. (This solution may be stored at 2–8°C for up to 3 months).
  4. Prepare amplification buffer/0.0015% H2O2 by adding 30% hydrogen peroxide (Component F) to amplification buffer (Component E) to obtain a final concentration of 0.0015% H2O2. For example, add 1 μL of 30% H2O2 to 200 μL of amplification buffer and then add 1 μL of this intermediate dilution (0.15% H2O2) to a further 100 μL of amplification buffer.
manuscript_citation: Heinen MC, Babler A, Weis J, Elsas J, Nolte K, Kipp M, Jahnen-Dechent W, Häusler M (2018) Fetuin-A protein distribution in mature inflamed and ischemic brain tissue. PLoS ONE 13(11): e0206597. doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0206597
guidelines:
• use with Tyramide Signal Amplification Kit (life technologies, T-20933)
  • for this type of tissue fluorescence staining of fetuin-A was only possible by using tyramide signal amplification. Thus co-staining was possible using two mouse-anti-human antibodies one after the other

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"42o3a","text":"Place slides in hybridization oven: 37\u00b0C overnight, then 1 hour at 65\u00b0C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"delp7","text":"Deparaffination in xylene 3x20 minutes (different containers) on a shaker","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4sqkp","text":"Rehydration in graded ethanol: 3x2 minutes in 100% ethanol, followed by 2x2 minutes in 96% ethanol and at last 2 minutes in 70% ethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4ns7s","text":"Wash in PBS for 5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"gqsm","text":"Antigen retrieval in Tris-EDTA buffer (pH 9) in a heat steamer for 30 minutes. Afterwards let the slides cool down in PBS for 30 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6c10g","text":"Wash in PBS for 5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"73lgh","text":"Encircle tissue section with wax pen","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"23af1","text":"To block non-specific binding, apply a solution of 10% goat serum in PBS, incubation for 1 hour in a moisture chamber","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ba3qv","text":"Tip off excess solution and apply the primary anti-fetuin-A-antibody (MAHS-1, dilution 1 \u00b5g\/ml in 1% BSA in PBS) 100 \u00b5l per section,\u00a0 (negative controls: only 1% dilution), incubation overnight in a moisture chamber","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dr2hg","text":"Tip off excess solution and rinse in demineralized water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2pvs2","text":"Wash in PBS for 3x5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b9as4","text":"Apply the secondary biotinylated goat-anti-mouse antibody (dilution 1:300 in 1%\u00a0 BSA in PBS), 100 \u00b5l per section, incubation for 1 hour at room temperature in a moisture chamber","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6b6a6","text":"Tip off excess solution and rinse in demineralized water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9aqb1","text":"Wash in PBS for 3x5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"enqm2","text":"Apply the Tyramide Signal Amplification Kit as follows: Dilute the prior prepared HRP solution 1:100 in 1% BSA in PBS, apply 100 \u00b5l per section, incubation for 1 hour at room temperature in a moisture chamber.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5kli6","text":"Tip off excess solution and rinse in demineralized water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d71mn","text":"Wash in PBS for 3x5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eou03","text":"Prepare a tyramide working solution following the manufacturer\u2019s protocol: dilute the prior prepared tyramide stock solution 1:100 in the prepared 0.0015% hydrogen peroxid solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"15avq","text":"Apply 100 \u00b5l per section, incubation for 10 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"likl","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1amtv","text":"keep the tissue samples from now on light protected!","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":52,"style":"italic"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5ph1i","text":"Tip off excess solution and rinse in demineralized water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d168o","text":"Wash in PBS for 3x5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1g8md","text":"Apply the primary anti-CD68 antibody (dilution 1:50 in 1% BSA in PBS), 100 \u00b5l per section (negative controls: only 1% dilution), incubation overnight in a moisture chamber","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3rb0e","text":"Apply the polyclonal goat-anti-mouse Alexa Fluor\u00ae 488 conjugated secondary antibody (dilution 1:300 in 1% BSA in PBS), 100 \u00b5l per section, incubation for 90 minutes at room temperature in a moisture chamber","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"42ucq","text":"Tip off excess solution and rinse in demineralized water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"35psp","text":"Wash in PBS for 3x5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8a256","text":"To minimize lipofuscin autofluorescence, perform counterstaining with Sudan Black (dilution 0.3% in 70% ethanol) for 5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bh3bp","text":"Rinse the container with demineralized water until the solution becomes clear and colorless","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eha8a","text":"Wash in demineralized water for 3x5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f6ppf","text":"Counterstain with DAPI (dilution 0.25 \u00b5g\/ml) for 5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dv9i0","text":"Wash in PBS for 3x5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"54v48","text":"Coverslip using mounting medium","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"94pb6","text":"Store at 8\u00b0C in the dark","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"acp5j","text":"Check tissue requirements and prepare the components of the Tyramide Signal Amplification Kit","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
